description: Solubor Boron is a highly soluble form of boron, an essential micronutrient for plants. It is used to correct boron deficiencies.
application_rates: 10-15 g/10 L of water (spray) or 5-10 kg/ha (soil application)
frequency_of_use: Apply 1-2 times during growing season, preferably during flowering and fruiting stages
side_effect: Use as directed, as excessive boron can be toxic to plants. Avoid inhalation of dust. Store in a dry place.
symptoms: Poor flowering, fruit development issues, stunted growth, leaf curling
causes: Boron deficiency in soil affecting plant growth and development
